_header: Love not the world ne falseness
Subjects: sermons, verse in; transitoriness, of world
_description: The world is transitory — three couplets in a sermon on death

BodBar24.Transcription:
Love noȝtte þe world ne ffalsenysseNe no þyng þat
                    in hym euyll ysThe world passyth and sone woll gooAnd all hys couetyse
                    alosthe worldys blysse whoso wyllythBut he be wre hyt sone hym
                    spyllythe
BodBar24.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “I Sing of a Maiden: A Fifteenth-Century Sermon Reminiscence.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 25 [223] (1978): 108: 108.
